thi-ap29:3.1: 9 Yasodharāpamukhadasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → dasabhikkhunīsahassāpadānaṃ (bj) | dasasahassatheriyāpadānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yasovatīpamukkhāni dasabhikkhunī sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap29:7.1: sabbapati hohi → sabbapati hoti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sabbā patī honti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap29:8.3: Dīgharattañca no → dīgharattamidaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | dīgharattaṃ mayaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
